import React from 'react' import Select from '../Select' function FilterModel({show, setGrouping, setOrdering, grouping, ordering}) { const groupFilterOptions = [{name: "Status", value: "status"}, {name: "User", value: "userId"}, {name: "Priority", value: "priority"}] const orderFilterOptions = [{name: "Priority", value: "priority"}, {name: "Title", value: "title"} ] return show &&
Grouping
} export default FilterModel
